trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Trepidation is writ plain on Lad Kenn's face.
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the giant beavers.
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Lad Kenn.
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_TODO_02<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter “Lad Kenn” to call out to the pixie.
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Nee Ys.
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_LADKENN_000_000<tab>No, this is not the time for tears. If we hurry, we might still prevent the unthinkable from coming to pass.
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_LADKENN_000_001<tab>You see, the marble─it was Kenn Gyuf's treasure, and Uin Hagan had always wanted one like it.
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_LADKENN_000_002<tab>Now, Uin Hagan went to collect the marble near the lake, yes? I will give chase and try to find them.
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_LADKENN_000_003<tab>Meanwhile, I need you to return to Phisor Lran to see if there's any change with the beaver. Afterwards, let us meet at the stables yonder.
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_BEAVERA03397_000_010<tab><squeal> <squeal>
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>It seems to be saying, “I love milk. Thank you.”
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_BEAVERB03397_000_012<tab><squeal> <squeal>
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>It seems to be saying, “The marble is pretty. Thank you.”
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_LADKENN_000_020<tab><sigh> Try as I might, I couldn't find Uin Hagan. What of the beaver?
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_LADKENN_000_021<tab>What!? Uin Hagan too!? It's my fault! It's all my fault! <sob>

TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_LADKENN_000_022<tab>...No, it's the <var 1A 02 /var>beaver<var 1A 01 /var> that's to blame! It's all that accursed creature's doing! Grrr, I'm going to teach it a lesson it'll never forget!
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>Lad Kenn flies off in the direction of Phisor Lran. You can't help but have a bad feeling about this...
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_SYSTEM_000_024<tab>Lad Kenn

TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_SYSTEM_000_025<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter “Lad Kenn” to call out to the enraged pixie.
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_BEAVERC03397_000_030<tab><squeal> <squeal> <squeal>
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>It seems to be saying, “I found my friends. Thank you. Seek out Nee Ys─they will give you a reward in my stead.”
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_BEAVERC03397_000_032<tab><squeal> <squeal>
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_SYSTEM_000_033<tab>It continues, “If Nee Ys proves uncooperative, however, tell them I've hidden my lovely pair of shoes inside the roof.”
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_BEAVERA03397_000_034<tab><squeal> <squeal>
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_SYSTEM_000_035<tab>It seems to be saying, “I love milk. Thank you.”
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_BEAVERB03397_000_036<tab><squeal> <squeal>
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_SYSTEM_000_037<tab>It seems to be saying, “The marble is pretty. Thank you.”
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_BEAVERC03397_000_038<tab><squeal> <squeal> <squeal>
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_SYSTEM_000_039<tab>It seems to be saying, “I found my friends. Thank you. Seek out Nee Ys─they will give you a reward in my stead.”
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_BEAVERC03397_000_040<tab><squeal> <squeal>
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>It continues, “If Nee Ys proves uncooperative, however, tell them I've hidden my lovely pair of shoes inside the roof.”
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_NEEYS_000_050<tab>Hm? You want to play, do you?
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_NEEYS_000_051<tab>...Is that so? Well, it's got naught to do with me. I don't owe you anything.
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_NEEYS_000_052<tab>If you want a reward, you must play with me first. It's only fair. Let's see, now... Yes, a couple of years ought to do it.
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_NEEYS_000_053<tab>...Truly!? Oh, those shoes are the loveliest! When Lad Kenn flaunted them, it made me so jealous! Ah, to think that they'll be mine now!
TEXT_LUCKZC014_03397_NEEYS_000_054<tab>Here's a little something by way of thanks! With that, I'm off to collect my shoes! Tee hee!
